episodes.title: Exposing CFM  |  Is Potters House A Cult?
episodes.description:
"Exposing CFM" is a short documentary film examining the cult behaviors of Wayman Mitchell's organization: Christian Fellowship Ministries. CFM is the umbrella organization for the Potters House Church, The Door Church, as well as Victory Chapel. Wayman's son, Greg Mitchell, now leads the organization, but their controversial behavior's have stayed true to their roots. We hope you enjoy this film.


Resources:
www.pottershousecult.com/resources/
www.facebook.com/groups/Wayman.Mitchell/


Producer and team will remain anonymous. 
Contact: cfmexposed@gmail.com
